## AdaptiveCardResponse enum

Options used to control how the response card will be sent to users.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum AdaptiveCardResponse 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  NewForAll | <code>2</code> | The response card will be sent as a new message for all users in the chat. |
|  ReplaceForAll | <code>1</code> | The response card will be replaced the current one for all users in the chat. |
|  ReplaceForInteractor | <code>0</code> | The response card will be replaced the current one for the interactor who trigger the action. |
